extension_description.message: Exterminate the maggots infesting the chat!

display_unifyName_description.message: Unify all usernames displayed in the chat to a name of your choice. If Hide Usernames is enabled, this will not be displayed.

display_break_description.message: Remove line breaks from comments and display them in a single line. Long comments may get cut off.

display_stripe_description.message: Apply a striped color pattern to the chat.

display_stripeColor_description.message: Set the color of the stripes.

display_unifyNameValue_description.message: What name would you like to use?

display_font_description.message: Change the font of the chat. Leaving it blank will reset it to default.

display_fontSize_description.message: Change the font size of the chat. The default is 13px.

filter_filter_description.message: Toggle the filter on or off.

filter_range_description.message: If off, only comments are deleted; if on, everything is deleted.

filter_charLimit_description.message: Limit the number of characters in comments.

filter_emoteLimit_description.message: Limit the number of emotes in comments.

danmaku_danmaku_description.message: Toggle danmaku on or off. Reload if it doesn't display.

danmaku_font_description.message: Set the font for the danmaku.

danmaku_fontSize_description.message: Set the font size for the danmaku.

danmaku_opacity_description.message: Setting to 0% makes it completely transparent.

danmaku_speed_description.message: Set to 10, it will take 10 seconds to scroll from right to left.

other_countdown_description.message: Displays the time until the next 15-minute Twitch bonus appears.

blockedWords_input_placeholder.message: You can register words you wish to block. Note that half-width and full-width characters are distinguished. Regular expressions are also supported. (Example:/^a/ , /^[a-z]/i)

blockedUsers_input_placeholder.message: You can register users you wish to block. Note that half-width and full-width characters are distinguished. Regular expressions are also supported. (Example:/^a/ , /^[a-z]/i)

blockedEmotes_input_placeholder.message: You can register emoticons you wish to block. Note that half-width and full-width characters are distinguished. Regular expressions are also supported. (Example:/^a/ , /^[a-z]/i)
